definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream
as cold as ice and frost (idiom, usually of woman); icy manner/frigid

sentences.english: Like young Long female although appearance if angel, actually icedcold sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 像小龙女般虽然貌若天仙，却冷若冰霜的情人。

sentences.english: Sven denied he was an "ice man".
sentences.chinese: 埃里克森否认自己是一个“冷若冰霜的男人”。

sentences.english: Ice Trolls have been observed to live in both igloo-like structures and simple tents.
sentences.chinese: 冰霜巨魔被认为居住在一种圆顶雪房或是简易帐篷中。

sentences.english: There's too much fer the fridge. I'll put it the garage. It's cold there.
sentences.chinese: 冰霜里东西太多了，我来吧它放到车库里去，那里冷。

sentences.english: Quickly unfreezes the iced parts of the lock mechanism and recovers their mobility.
sentences.chinese: 快速融化汽车门锁的冰霜，回复门锁灵活性。

sentences.english: They also moved the 2x threat effect over to Frost Shock, FYI.
sentences.chinese: 他们也把2倍仇恨效果挪到了冰霜震击上，你瞧。

sentences.english: Frostdamage has a chance to paralyse target if health is lo.
sentences.chinese: 当地人的生命值很低时，冰霜伤害有几率麻痹敌人。

sentences.english: To be received in your frozen manner is heart-rending.
sentences.chinese: 受到你那冷若冰霜的接待，我的心都裂开来了。

sentences.english: This will be discussed further with the Frost tree.
sentences.chinese: 这个会放在冰霜系那部份来进一步讨论。

sentences.english: We may be frozen emotionally, unable to respond.
sentences.chinese: 我们也许是冷若冰霜而无法作出反应。

sentences.english: Teachers should not treat their pupils coldly.
sentences.chinese: 教师对待学生不应该冷若冰霜。

sentences.english: But repeated searches for this myriad population of frosty worlds came up empty-handed .
sentences.chinese: 但是这一大群冰霜世界，却遍寻不著。

sentences.english: Ice trolls are a subspecies of troll that lives in cold climates.
sentences.chinese: 冰霜巨魔是一种生活在寒冷气候中的巨魔亚种。

sentences.english: Will ghouls ever get their voices back?
sentences.chinese: 食尸鬼是否冰霜死骑输出会恢复语音？

sentences.english: Her indifference aroused perhaps his combative soul.
sentences.chinese: 她的冷若冰霜也许激起了他好胜的灵魂。

definition: to freeze over/to ice over/icebound/to shelve (a proposal etc)
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
